data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Miami's Robbie Robinson has run offside.
In the minute 5, Atlanta are coming forward and Emerson Hyndman gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Miami pushes forward through Victor Ulloa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 8, Miami drive forward but Rodolfo Pizarro is judged offside.
Miles Robinson (Atlanta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Atlanta push forward at Inter Miami CF Stadium and Ezequiel Barco gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Miami defence.
In the minute 20, Robbie Robinson of Miami gets in a strike, but is off target.
Atlanta's Ezequiel Barco is on target but unsuccessful.
In Fort Lauderdale, Jon Gallagher of Atlanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 27, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Lewis Morgan gives Miami a 1-0 lead in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 33, Atlanta's Eric Remedi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Miami defender.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Eric Remedi.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Lewis Morgan.
Ben Sweat with an assist there.
Important block from the Miami defence as Anton Walkes fires in a strike for Atlanta.
In the minute 40, Miami's Nicolas Figal has been booked in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
At Inter Miami CF Stadium, Leandro Gonzalez Pirez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half is underway at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In Fort Lauderdale Miami attack through Lewis Morgan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 46, Dylan Nealis is on a sub for Nicolas Figal for Miami.
Ezequiel Barco (Atlanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 48, Free kick Atlanta.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami drive upfield and Robbie Robinson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
In the minute 52, Miami's Lewis Morgan misses with an attempt on goal.
Erick Torres of Atlanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The home team replace Brek Shea with Juan Agudelo.
In the minute 60, Diego Alonso is making the team's first substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Blaise Matuidi replacing Jay Chapman.
Matheus Rossetto is replacing Jurgen Damm for the away team.
Miles Robinson (Atlanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Miami make their fourth substitution with Julian Carranza replacing Robbie Robinson.
Atlanta's Ezequiel Barco breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 74, In Fort Lauderdale, Julian Carranza of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Adam Jahn is replacing Jon Gallagher for Atlanta at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 75, Dylan Nealis (Miami) gets a yellow card.
In Fort Lauderdale Atlanta drive forward through Emerson Hyndman. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The away team replace Erick Torres with Jake Mulraney.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Eric Remedi with Jeff Larentowicz. This is the fourth substitution made today by Stephen Glass.
Jeff Larentowicz (Atlanta) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
